meanings.definition: Of or relating to the front part of the frontal lobe in the brain.
meanings.sent1: The prefrontal area of the brain helps with decision-making.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the prefrontal lobe to understand its functions better.
meanings.sent3: The prefrontal region of the brain must be well cared for to stay healthy.
meanings.sent4: Her prefrontal cortex was like a wise advisor, guiding her actions.
meanings.sent5: The prefrontal lobe is crucial for logical thinking and problem-solving.

meanings.definition: Situated in front of the frontal region.
meanings.sent1: The prefrontal area of the room received the most sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The prefrontal seats in the theater offered the best view.
meanings.sent3: The prefrontal position in the line allowed for an early entrance.
meanings.sent4: His prefrontal location at the event made him feel important.
meanings.sent5: The prefrontal spot at the table was reserved for special guests.
